items.summary:
Move all Super Admin seeding execution so it runs only during canister initialization (system func init) and never during upgrade lifecycle hooks.

- In `backend/main.mo`, remove any Super Admin/admin seeding code that exists inside `system func preupgrade()` (if present). Remove the entire seeding block and do not leave conditional checks there.
- In `backend/main.mo`, remove Super Admin seeding from `system func postupgrade()` (currently calls `seedSuperAdmin()`), so `postupgrade()` performs no admin seeding.
- Add (or open if already present) `system func init()` in `backend/main.mo` and execute the seed logic there:
  - `if (adminUsers.size() == 0) { seedSuperAdmin(); }`
- Ensure the seeding runs only once on initial deployment and does not create duplicate Super Admin records on subsequent calls.
- Keep any stable storage save/restore logic untouched (do not change state serialization/restore behavior).

Do not change authentication behavior other than relocating the seeding execution point.

- Do not modify the password hashing function implementation (`hashPassword`).
- Do not modify admin login verification logic/output semantics (e.g., `adminLogin`, `debugAdminLogin` comparisons and return shapes).
- Any user-facing text introduced/changed by this change must be in English (no new non-English messages).
